metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Flaming Fist from the Eastway's Disappointment Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Flaming Fist from the Eastway's Disappointment vignette, in front of Baldur's Mouth.

0.speaker: Fist Ernestus
0.text: I don't have time to arrest lowlifes like you as well - clear off, please.

1.speaker: Fist Ernestus
1.text: Didn't you hear? Get moving or I'll have to count you as part of this illegal gathering too.

2.speaker: Fist Ernestus
2.text: You have our city's best interests at heart, too - I'm just doing my part by trying to keep the peace.
2.context: NodeContext: Genuinely likes/is impressed by the player; believes they're on the same side

3.speaker: Fist Ernestus
3.text: If this lot have got a problem with the Gazette they should take it up with the editor, not make a scene in the streets.
3.context: NodeContext: Weary (but genuinely believes he's helping)

4.speaker: Fist Ernestus
4.text: I know the Gazette sometimes bends the truth - but I also know they wouldn't lie about all the good you've done.
4.context: NodeContext: Genuinely likes/is impressed by the player

5.speaker: Fist Ernestus
5.text: Lord Gortash has to make some tough decisions to keep this city safe - I hope this rabble understands that.
5.context: NodeContext: Weary (but genuinely believes he's helping/in Lord Gortash)
